title: august 13: class is in session at south park elementary
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the premiere of South Park, an animated sitcom created by Trey Parker and Matt Stone about a group of foul-mouthed schoolchildren in Colorado. The show, which is now on its 23rd season, was a phenomenon for its often controversial satirization of cultural touchstones and current events. After, she reflects on Woodstock ‘94. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
